meanings.definition: A person who adds notes or comments to a text or document.
meanings.sent1: The annotator wrote helpful notes in the margins of the book.
meanings.sent2: The teacher used an annotator to mark important points in the essay.
meanings.sent3: The annotator joked by adding funny comments to the report.
meanings.sent4: Her pen danced like an annotator, leaving a trail of insights.
meanings.sent5: The annotator's colorful notes made the document easier to understand.

meanings.definition: A tool or software used to add notes or comments to a text or document.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using an annotator to highlight key information in my notes.
meanings.sent2: The annotator on my computer helps me organize my research findings.
meanings.sent3: The annotator software made the text look like a rainbow with all the notes.
meanings.sent4: The annotator function acted like a digital pen, marking the screen.
meanings.sent5: With the annotator, I can easily add comments to the document.
